title: Spacious 2bed 2bath POSSIBLY COMING SOON! Northern Pines Apartments
posting_body: Spacious 2 bedroom two bath apartment homes.
Northern Pines Apartments has a great Location!

Inside out lovely community we offer updated flooring, newly resurfaced tubs and countertops*, new window Blinds, separate laundry room area, 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance, our community is cable ready, online rental payments available and yes, we are pet friendly.
Located right off of I-285 Church Street Exit.
And just minutes from Northlake Mall, Restaurants, Banking, Stone Mountain Park and lots of shopping.
A few of our community amenities are we have  private patios and balconies included in each two bedroom  homes and there is also a picnic and BBQ area for your grilling pleasure.
Prices start as low as $1,250 (includes water)
Our days of operation are Mon/Weds/Friday of each week
Application fee is just $50.00 with a $150.00 reservation fee
